name: Manufacturing Northern Ireland
goal:
We work to help create the most competitive region in Europe in which to start and sustain a manufacturing business creating wealth and work.

Representative organisation for the manufacturing sector in Northern Ireland.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Interested in the UK's exit from the EU and the specific challenges this creates in Northern Ireland - Brexit

We also have an interest in the competitiveness area specifically through innovation and employment Law
